title: How to write a request letter for TC - Quora

response.answer_text: To,The Principal,School NamePlace, State Subject: Application for School Leaving Certificate Respected Sir, With due respect, I want to state that I was a student at your prestigious institute and I have passed 8class from your school. I have passed 8 classes and got ….. marks. Now for further studies, i need school leaving certificate. So please kindly give me school leaving certificate. I shall be thankful to you for this. Yours Truly,X, Y, Z date You can change the main body according to your convenience.
